plot: The first European adventurers, known as "coureurs des bois," appeared in New France. On a trip that takes us from Quebec to Montreal, then to the Great Lakes, following the traces of early trappers.
title: The Greatest Journeys on Earth: Quebec - The Journeys of the Trappers
plot_es: The first European adventurers, known as "coureurs des bois," appeared in New France. On a trip that takes us from Quebec to Montreal, then to the Great Lakes, following the traces of early trappers.
original_name: The Greatest Journeys on Earth: Quebec - The Journeys of the Trappers
plot_en: The first European adventurers, known as "coureurs des bois," appeared in New France. On a trip that takes us from Quebec to Montreal, then to the Great Lakes, following the traces of early trappers.
